name: Maya's Miracle
description:
In this game, you play as Maya, a young trans girl. Join her on an adventure through time to meet influential historical figures!

Made by Sam Dubeau in 48 hours for the Academy Challenge!

Download the .exe file, extract the folder, and open the file titled "game.exe" to run it!

Note: If you encounter any issues or bugs, be sure to contact the developer - in the meantime, close the game and start again.
